data.Sentence_cn: 前首相温特沃兹.莱恩先生在最近的大选中被击败。
data.Sentence: The former Prime Minister, Mr.Wentworth Lane, was defeated in the recent elections.

data.Sentence_cn: 他现在退出了政界，到国外去了。
data.Sentence: He is now retiring from political life and has gone abroad.

data.Sentence_cn: 我的朋友帕特里克一直是莱恩先生的激进党的强烈反对者。
data.Sentence: My friend, Patrick, has always been a fanatical opponent of Mr. Lane's Radical Progressive Party.

data.Sentence_cn: 大选结束后，帕特里克来到了前首相的住处。
data.Sentence: After the elections, Patrick went to the former Prime Minister's house.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他询问莱恩先生是否住在那里时，值班的警察告诉他这位前首相落选后出国去了。
data.Sentence: When he asked if Mr. Lane lived there, the policeman on duty told him that since his defeat, the ex-Prime Minister had gone abroad.

data.Sentence_cn: 第二天，帕特里克再次来到首相的住处。
data.Sentence: On the following day, Patrick went to the house again.

data.Sentence_cn: 昨天的那位警察正从门口慢慢走过，帕特里克上前问了和昨天同样的问题。
data.Sentence: The same policeman was just walking slowly past the entrance, when Patrick asked the same question.

data.Sentence_cn: 虽然那位警察这次有点疑心，但还是对他作了同样的回答。
data.Sentence: Though a little suspicious this time, the policeman gave him the same answer.

data.Sentence_cn: 第三天，帕特里克又去了，提出了同前两天完全一样的问题。
data.Sentence: The day after, Patrick went to the house once more and asked exactly the same question.

data.Sentence_cn: 这一次警察火了。“我昨天和前天都告诉过您了，”他大叫着，
data.Sentence: This time, the policeman lost his temper. 'I told you yesterday and the day before yesterday,' he shouted,

data.Sentence_cn: “莱恩先生在大选中被击败了，
data.Sentence: 'Mr. Lane was defeated in the elections.

data.Sentence_cn: 他已经退出了政界去国外了！”
data.Sentence: He has retired from political life and gone to live abroad!'

data.Sentence_cn: “这我都知道，”帕特里克说，“可我就是喜欢听你说出这此！”
data.Sentence: 'I know,' answered Patrick, 'but I love to hear you say it!'
